body: This would be way more interesting if it was translated...

@EXBD619: I know what the problem is: since the new tagging system, the search engine in this site is so fucked up, sometimes some results won't even show. I just got from the "More Like This" section immediately above the comments. Here you can read the rest that are missing for ya: https://nhentai.net/g/275780/
Seriously, I thoroughly LOVE this series, but where’s chapters 5 through 22?
